artifactDefinition.businessDescription: Every token instance has an owner. The Non-transferable behavior prevents the owner of a token from changing.
artifactDefinition.businessExample: A vote token, for a citizen in a public election would be non-transferable.

analogies.name: Diploma
analogies.description: A diploma from an educational institution is not transferable to another party that can claim to have earned the diploma.

analogies.name: Airline Ticket
analogies.description: Due to security restrictions at airports and airlines, tickets can only be used by the person they were issued to.
